verses.t: What{G5101} advantage{G4053} then{G3767} hath the Jew{G2453}? or{G2228} what{G5101} profit{G3588} is there of circumcision{G3588}?

For{G1063} if{G1487} the truth{G3588} of God{G3588} hath more abounded{G4052} through{G1722} my{G1699} lie{G5582} unto{G1519} his{G846} glory{G3588}; why{G5101} yet{G2089} am I also{G2504} judged{G2919} as{G5613} a sinner{G268}?

What{G5101} then{G3767}? are we better{G4284} than they? No{G3756}, in no wise{G3843}: for{G1063} we have before proved{G4256} both{G2532} Jews{G2453} and{G5037} Gentiles{G1672}, that they are{G1511} all{G3956} under{G5259} sin{G266};

Their{G846} throat{G3588} is an open{G455} sepulchre{G5028}; with{G3588} their{G846} tongues{G1100} they have used deceit{G1387}; the poison{G2447} of asps{G785} is under{G5259} their{G846} lips{G3588}:

Therefore{G1360} by{G1537} the deeds{G2041} of the law{G3551} there shall{G1344} no{G3756} flesh{G4561} be justified{G1344} in{G1799} his{G846} sight{G1799}: for{G1063} by{G1223} the law{G3551} is the knowledge{G1922} of sin{G266}.

Where{G4226} is boasting{G3588} then{G3767}? It is excluded{G1576}. By{G1223} what{G4169} law{G3551}? of works{G3588}? Nay{G3780}: but{G235} by{G1223} the law{G3551} of faith{G4102}.
